title: London Design Biennale & Royal Caribbean
description: Presented Silent Subtext film at London Design Biennale 2025. Created a nine-deck-high wishing tree for Royal Caribbean's Utopia of the Seas. Awarded Lifetime Design Excellence Award (2025).

title: Kalpataru & Yashobhoomi IICC
description: Created Kalpataru, a 20-ft light art installation for Project PARI, New Delhi. Commissioned centerpiece for Yashobhoomi IICC, inaugurated by PM Narendra Modi.

title: Pool of Dreams – Amsterdam Light Festival
description: Only Indian artist selected for the 12th Amsterdam Light Festival. Pool of Dreams now part of Amsterdam's permanent Light Art Collection.

title: SOGANI Luxury Lighting
description: Launched bespoke luxury lighting collection at Light + Building, Frankfurt. Featured exhibition at Italian Ambassador's residence, New Delhi.

title: Sprouts & Kalpavriksha
description: Created Sprouts, a 40-ft iconic public art installation in New Delhi, and Kalpavriksha, a 35-ft mirror-finished steel sculpture in Ahmedabad.

title: Exhibition Design & A'rise
description: Designed large-scale exhibition pavilions for DRDO Defexpo. Created A'rise, a 22-ft kinetic steel sculpture for Airtel HQ, Gurugram.
